name: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II Clinical Classification Parameter Code
synonym: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II Clinical Classification Parameter Code
definition: A parameter code codelist for the Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II Clinical Classification (APACHE II) to support the calculation of total score in ADaM.
term: CDISC ADaM Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II Clinical Classification Parameter Code Terminology

name: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II Clinical Classification Parameter Name
synonym: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II Clinical Classification Parameter Name
definition: A parameter name codelist for the Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II Clinical Classification (APACHE II) to support the calculation of total score in ADaM.
term: CDISC ADaM Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II Clinical Classification Parameter Name Terminology

name: Analysis Stratum
synonym: Analysis Stratum
definition: A terminology codelist containing the stratum values for analysis.
term: CDISC ADaM Analysis Stratum Terminology

name: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires Parameter Code
synonym: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires Parameter Code
definition: A parameter code codelist for the Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires (CHART-SF) to support the calculation of subscores and total score for the Interview and Paper Versions in ADaM.
term: CDISC ADaM Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires Parameter Code Terminology

name: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires Parameter Name
synonym: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires Parameter Name
definition: A parameter name codelist for the Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires (CHART-SF) to support the calculation of subscores and total score for the Interview and Paper Versions in ADaM.
term: CDISC ADaM Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires Parameter Name Terminology

name: Date Imputation Flag
synonym: Date Imputation Flag
definition: Date Imputation Flag: Indicates the level of imputation reflected in a date value.
term: CDISC ADaM Date Imputation Flag Terminology

name: Derivation Type
synonym: Derivation Type
definition: Derivation Type: Analysis value derivation method.
term: CDISC ADaM Derivation Type Terminology

name: Generalized Anxiety Disorder - 7 Version 2 Questionnaire Parameter Code

name: Generalized Anxiety Disorder - 7 Version 2 Questionnaire Parameter Name

name: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form Questionnaire Parameter Code
synonym: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form Questionnaire Parameter Code

synonym: Input Parameter

name: National Early Warning Score 2 Clinical Classification Parameter Code
synonym: National Early Warning Score 2 Clinical Classification Parameter Code
definition: A parameter code codelist for the National Early Warning Score 2 Clinical Classification (NEWS2) to support the calculation of total score in ADaM.

name: Parameter Type
synonym: Parameter Type
definition: Parameter Type: Indicates whether the parameter is derived as a function of one or more other parameters.

name: Pool for Integration
synonym: Pool for Integration
definition: Terminology relevant to the name of the Pool, often defined in the integrated statistical analysis plan, which identifies the combination of subjects' clinical trial experience and will be the focus of the integrated analysis.
term: CDISC ADaM Pool for Integration Terminology

name: Subject Trial Status
synonym: Subject Trial Status

name: Time Imputation Flag
